```{r dependencies}
library(Rfacebook)
library(dplyr)

invisible(
  sapply(c("fb-functions.R", "fb_auth.R"), source)
)
```

Downloading the Page's Newsfeed
```{r page posts}
## PUblic posts
page_posts <-
  getPage(
    page = "nesreanigeria",
    n = 100,
    token = nesreaToken,
    feed = TRUE
  )
```
```{r page posts #2}
glimpse(page_posts)
```

Note that the function `getPage()` can be used to harvest data from others' public posts via the `page` argument.


Insights on NESREA's Facebook Page
```{r}

insight.type <- c("page_fan_adds", "page_fan_removes", "page_views_login",
                  "page_views", "page_story_adds", "page_impressions",
                  "page_posts_impressions", "page_consumptions")

allInsights <- as.data.frame(lapply(insight.type, chooseInsight)) %>%
  select(matches("value|end_time.7")) %>%
  distinct(.)

colnames(allInsights)[1:8] <- gsub("^page_", "", insight.type)
colnames(allInsights)[9] <- "date"
allInsights$date <- as.Date(allInsights$date)
str(allInsights)
```
